attributes.action: use revenue form taxes levied on motorists to fund new tramway, light rail and rapid transit systems and extensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tramways and other urban mass transit schemes are very environmentally friendly and move large quantities of people taking many cars off the road and reducing congestion.
We would like the government to use most of the revenue generated from the London congestion charge, part of the fuel duty and part of the road tax along with revenue from any future scheme to help fund tramway and rapid transit like the Manchester Metrolink extensions and the proposed Leeds tramway system
